mapper.select: SELECT camera.mng_inst_cd ,camera.crsrd_id ,camera.camera_nm ,camera.lon_crdn ,camera.lat_crdn ,camera.angl ,asci.max_trfvlm ,asci.max_pdst_cnt ,asci.crsrd_nm ,asci.max_trfvlm ,asci.mng_inst_cd ,gcin.node_type ,gcin.node_name ,gcin.node_id FROM BIGDATA.EXT_adsi_smcrsrd_camera_info camera inner join BIGDATA.EXT_adsi_smcrsrd_crsrd_info asci on camera.crsrd_id = asci.crsrd_id inner join c_gm_std_node gcin on asci.node_id = gcin.node_id
